thread.title: Celebrities Had Zero Chill About Beyoncé's Surprise Pregnancy Just Like Us
thread.title_full: Celebrities Had Zero Chill About Beyoncé's Surprise Pregnancy Just Like Us

author: Cole Delbyck
title: Celebrities Had Zero Chill About Beyoncé's Surprise Pregnancy Just Like Us
text:
Celebrities Had Zero Chill About Beyoncé's Surprise Pregnancy Just Like Us "NO — YOU ARE CRYING BECAUSE BEYONCÉ IS HAVING TWINS." 02/01/2017 06:01 pm ET Cole Delbyck Entertainment Writer, The Huffington Post 
One might think fame and fortune would insulate celebrities from properly freaking out about Beyoncé ’s surprise pregnancy announcement on Wednesday, but there’s nothing like Queen Bey to humanize even the most untouchable of A-listers. 
Everyone from Brie Larson and Rihanna to Beyoncé ’s mom, Tina Knowles, and Ellen DeGeneres chimed in on social media about the newest additions to the Carter-Knowles family. Even former Bey feuder Piers Morgan had something nice to say! 
Check out some of the reactions from the likes of Zara Larsson, Laverne Cox, Issa Rae and more below: Congratulations to @Beyonce and the entire Knowles Carter family pic.twitter.com/YiAVd44TeS
